article.title: Using simpleSAMLphp as a SAML bridge

section.title: Setting up WebSSO bridges
section.para: simpleSAMLphp can be used to bridge between two WebSSO protocols. Below you will find short descriptions of how to setup the different bridge configurations.

section.title: Bridging SAML 2.0 <-> SAML 2.0

section.title: Support
section.para: If you need help to make this work, or want to discuss simpleSAMLphp with other users of the software, you are fortunate: Around simpleSAMLphp there is a great Open source community, and you are welcome to join! The forums are open for you to ask questions, contribute answers other further questions, request improvements or contribute with code or plugins of your own.
Visit the project page of simpleSAMLphp at: http://code.google.com/p/simplesamlphp/
